segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, and it’s making me really nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, and she’s just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is completely missing what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and it’s just making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone is acting in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching so far, and it’s like he’s tempting fate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, and it’s like she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and notice anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and it’s only going to cause more problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this whole situation is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
